title: Faith Departed
description: Starting a family was supposed to be easy.  Twin sisters June and July have never encountered an obstacle they couldnâ€™t overcome. Married just after graduating college, the girls and their husbands remained a close-knit group. Now settled and successful, the next logical step is children.  But as the couples struggle to conceive, each must reconcile the goodness of God with their present suffering. Will their faith be strong enough to triumph in the midst of trial?  Faith Departed is the first book in a Christian Women's Fiction series that walks along side two couples as they navigate the sometimes-painful, sometimes-hopeful waters of infertility. Buy your copy today to begin a journey with characters so real, you'll want them for your friends.
author: Elizabeth Maddrey
